title: Short-Intensive Training for Enhancing VR-Based Spatial Visualization Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of 3D geometry and PC/mobile device operation skills
context.additional_context: VR gamified learning emphasizing spatial thinking training required in language domains (e.g., translation, writing)

learning_goals: Learners reduce task completion time for 3D object rotation/rearrangement in VR environments by 40% within one week.
Learners improve accuracy in solving language problems (e.g., sentence structure analysis) using spatial visualization skills by 30%.
Learners achieve an average performance improvement of Cohen’s d ≥ 0.5 in VR-based spatial cognition tests.

resources: fNIRS-Based Alternative Cognitive Load Measurement Tool

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
